survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the satisfaction levels and experiences of commuters who use electric bicycles for their daily travel.

questions.question_text: How often do you use an electric bicycle for commuting?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice responses. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How often do you use an electric bicycle for commuting?

questions.question_text: What are the primary reasons you choose an electric bicycle for commuting? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice responses. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes), with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What are the primary reasons you choose an electric bicycle for commuting? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the battery life of your electric bicycle?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents who use electric bicycles at least occasionally (Q1 not 'Only occasionally')
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction. Ensure the scale is clearly labeled.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the battery life of your electric bicycle?
script.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents who use electric bicycles at least occasionally (Q1 not 'Only occasionally')

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for electric bicycle infrastructure in your area?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to gather qualitative feedback. Encourage detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for electric bicycle infrastructure in your area?
